name: Superpoz
description:
Prototype/concept game for the Nokia 3310 Jam

# Check out the alpha version if you want to test an updated version of the game #

Controls:
Movement & Jump - WASD/Arrow keys/Numpad 8, 4, 6, 2
Swap & Confirm - Space/Enter/Numpad 5
Pause & Back - Esc/Backspace/Numpad 7
Reset - R/Delete/Numpad 0

Toggle Sound - M/Numpad Minus
Toggle Backlight - L/Numpad Multiplier
Toggle Fullscreen - F11/Alt+Enter

P.S. for Jam version:
I had plans for a few more block types and a LOT more levels but unfortunately I didn't get the time due to the regular unforeseen consequences that comes with making a game. I think I'll keep working on the game, though.

Made using Construct 2

Enjoy!
